text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
—— We are down to our last 2 clans now. But the difference in 
military might is clear. If there's anyone who can unify the land, 
surely it's the Ro clan spearheaded by Oguri Cap!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: So the Ro's stronghold is located this way. I see soldiers are deployed in classic formations around the area, and the ratio of offensive to defensive forces is… mhmm.

text_block_list.name: [Ro Clan] Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text:
Hey, quit dawdling and come along! When we arrive 
at the stronghold, you'll let us in on all the information 
you have on the I clan, ya hear?

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Do not rush so, how should I know what information 
to provide if I don't understand your forces?

text_block_list.name: [Ro Clan] Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text:
Talk all you want, but… No, you're an oddball who 
turned her blade on her allies. Guess that's fine. 
…… If you try anything funny, I'll cut you down!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Pheh, do as you wish. Well then… under current conditions, should they not relent, they'll be heading… ——

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: —— Opportunities are created! I think so too, Yaeno. So, where do we start?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
Let us draw up a new plan. Risk is no longer a factor. 
We are already fighting with our backs against the wall. 
Dear Strategist, please devise our last stand!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hmm… alright then. If we're willing to take risks, our range of strategies expands significantly.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I-Is that so? That's amazing… Well, there's still the time limit… 
Will we be able to manage that?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Mm… The time limit, huh… We might be able to make use of that. 'Cause if they can't unify the land by then, it'll be a draw…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
That's right…! They will be searching for us too, won't they? 
Then, what if we don't search for them and purposely lure 
them out instead…!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. Dangle our banner in front of them and make 
them chase us deep into our territory… for example. 
It's high risk, but I think there's value in attempting it.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ah… Aaah～～! I understand～～～? Um… well…

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
Let us go with that plan. If we stay merely 
as we are, we will slowly be overpowered.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: 'Tis do or die, we will strike first!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
(Everyone's thinking so hard… and actually extremely serious? 
Am I… good enough? Just following along…)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
(No, I need to… I need to do a little more… 
After all… we've worked so hard together 
to get to this point…!)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Uh… um… in that case…! You can leave carrying 
the banner to me… if that's alright?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I… I've been praised for having good long run pace. 
Simply running away and dispersing the enemy is 
something I think I could manage, so…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Even though fighting them and thinking of strategies 
might be a bit too much for me, I'm sure I can at least 
pull that off…!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Miracle… Very well, I leave it to you! 
Everyone, let us be off!

The I clan has fallen back deep into their own territory. 
While the enemy army steadily sends in more troops, 
they continue their tenacious escape…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hm? What is that…? There's something caught on that rock… "To the I clan"?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
Did it come from further upstream? 
There's something inside of it. This is…!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
A message? No… 'tis a map… 
of the Ro clan's battle formations!?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
This… shows the number of troops, their arrangement, 
and a shortcut～? But hey, this strangely dynamic writing… 
no way…!?

text_block_list.name: [Ro Clan] Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: —— They're here!! Cut them doooown～!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Hyaa! Oh no!?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Miracle, take the banner! We will deal with this later! 
Commence the operation!

text_block_list.name: [I Clan] Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: Understood!!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: (No… it couldn't be…!)

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Haaaa——!!

text_block_list.name: [Ro Clan] Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Don't falter now! Their general is down to one life! Take them do— waaaah!!

text_block_list.name: [Ro Clan] Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text: Vwaah, haah…! W-Wait! Damn it, when's that Miracle girl gonna run out of stamina…!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Hahh, hyeeh～ I'm dying…! But… just a little longer～!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Yaeno! Don't push too far! We can do this if we 
keep to the formation! Drive them all up north!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Acknowledged! Taaaah!

text_block_list.name: [Ro Clan] Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Uugh! They're clearly targeting the areas with few troops! How…!? How do they knooow!?

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
It appears that the horsegirls of the Ro clan are being lured 
into enemy territory! Furthermore, they're getting separated 
and steadily cut down as if by magic!?

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Symboli Kris S, who has been on constant lookout, is now 
forced to move! Tanino Gimlet looks like she's backing her up! 
They're heading straight towards the enemy!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Haa, haah, haa…!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: We finally dragged them out then. —— To battle!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
(However… everyone's already at their limits. 
Any more and we're done for. But… but… we're so close!)
(Shling!)

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: (Oh no! I've been—)

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Hoh now… 'twas perilous indeed! Glad I've narrowly made it in time!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: …! I knew it…! You're late, No Reason!
